results.title: Case report: mitochondrial diabetes mellitus in a Chinese family due to m.3243A>G.
results.text_hl: What is new: (1) @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Myopathy_with_Diabetes @DISEASE_MESH:C564026 @@@Mitochondrial diabetes@@@ in childhood may not be accompanied by @<m>DISEASE_Deafness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003638 @@@deafness@@@ even with highly heteroplasmy levels. (2) In @<m>DISEASE_Deafness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003638 @@@MIDD@@@ patients, sometimes @DISEASE_Hearing_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D034381 @@@hearing loss@@@ cannot be perceived, which requires us to conduct detailed physical examinations and related examinations. (3) The use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Deafness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003638 @@@MIDD@@@ patients did not have adverse consequences.

citations.NLM: Bai W, Zhang Q, Fan Y, Han T, Gu N, Zhang Y, Liang F, Ma Y, Xiong H. Case report: mitochondrial diabetes mellitus in a Chinese family due to m.3243A>G. J Pediatr Endocrinol Metab. 2023 Jul 18;():. PMID: 37459161
